_header: Litany is a song as ye may oft I-see
Title(s): Letania maior et minor; South English Legendary
_description: ‘Letania maior et minor’, in the South English Legendary — 56 lines

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
LEtanie is a song þat ȝe mowe ofte seoto bidde eche halwe
                    aftur oþer oure help to beo…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…þe feste of holy thorsday & eke of witsondayIn
                    þe gospell who so loke þere he it finde may
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

Bod779.First Lines:
Letanye is asong as ȝe mowe ofte I seto bidde ech halwe after
                    oþer oure help for to be…
Bod779.Last Lines:
… Þat we holde so þis precessionis & þe fasting
                    witoute synneþat frut an erþe com wel forþ to helping to
                    alle man kinne
Bod779.Note: No heading so treated as part of 4697.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Letanye is a song þat ȝe mouwen ofte i seoTo bidde vche
                    seint aftur oþur vre help forto beo…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Nou for þulke heiȝe feste þat is Godes soneLet
                    vs vr sunnes bete her þe fend to ouercome. A.M.E.N.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh43.First Lines:
LEtanye is asong as ȝe mowe ofte iseTo bidde ech halwe after
                    oþer our help uorte be…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Vor it nys no neode wenne hi beþ þer to sette hem here
                    alsoVor sette hem here & ek þer it nere noȝt wel
                    ido

BodTan17.First Lines:
Afterward þe fourtiþe þat he ros fro deþ to
                    lyueHe steigh in to heuyn with his woundis fyueAs it falliþ on
                    halwe þorisday þat he gan to heue styȝeBut arst holi chirche
                    halt þe feste of letanyeLetanye is a song as ȝe moun ofte I
                    seTo bidde eche halwe aftir oþer oure help for to
                    be…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…þat we holde so þe processiouns & þe fasting
                    wit oute sinneþat þe frut on erþe come wel forþ to
                    helpe of man kinne…
BodTan17.Note:
Begins f. 77, mid-page, possibly a longer unique version, describing two
                    feasts of litany, one the greater — St. Mark’s Day and one the
                    lesser — Rogation; ending imperfectly at bottom f.
                    77v.

OxfTri57.First Lines:
Letanie ys a song þat ȝe mowe ofte y seoTo bidde ech
                    halwe after oþer oure help for to beo…
OxfTri57.Last Lines:
…ffor it nys no ned whanne hy buþ þer to sette hem here
                    al soffor to sette hem here & ek þereit were noȝt wel y
                    do
OxfTri57.Note: Written as stanzas of 6 lines, aabbcc.

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Letanie is a song as ȝe moweþ ofte iseTo bidde ech halwe
                    after oþer oure help forto be…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…ffor it nis no neod wanne hi beoþ þere to sette is here
                    alsofforto sette is here & eke þere hit nere noȝt wel
                    ido

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Letanye is a song as ȝe mowe ofte yseoTo bydde ech halwe after
                    oþer oure help ffor to beo…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…ffor hit nys no neod whan hi beoþ þer to sette ham her
                    alsoTo sette ham her and eke þer hit nore no neode to do

CamStJohn28.First Lines:
letanyȝe is a song as ȝe moun oftyn seto preyȝe
                    euery seynt after oþer þat he oure helpe be…
CamStJohn28.Last Lines:
…þe feste of holy þrusday & eke of witsonedayIn
                    þe gospel ho so lokiþ þer hem fynden he may
CamStJohn28.Note:
Followed by ‘Ioachym & Anne’ referring reader to go back
                    to folio 25 to contiue text.

CamTCC605.First Lines:
LEtanie is a songe as ȝe mowe wel yseTo bydde echehalwe after
                    oþer oure helpe to be…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…God for loue of seint marke ous ȝyue here suche
                    graceÞat we mot in heuene at oure ende habbe a place
CamTCC605.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.
         https://mss-cat.trin.cam.ac.uk/Manuscript/R.3.25.

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: LEtani is a song as ȝe mowe ouȝte iseto bidde ech halwe efter oþer our help for to be…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …for hit nis no ned whan hi ber þere to sette hit here alsofor to sette hom here & ek þere hit nere nout wel ido
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xxxiiii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 64v).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Letanie is a song as ȝe mowe ofte iseoTo bidde ech seint after oþer oure help vorte beo…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …God vor þe loue of seint mark vs ȝeue such graceÞat we mote after oure ende in hauene habbe a place

BLEge2810.First Lines: Letanie is a song as ȝe mowe oft yseto buche ech alwe after oþer vr elp fort to be…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …vor hit nis no neode wan hii beþ þer to sette hire alsovor to sette is here & ek þere it nere noȝt wel ydo

BLEge2891.Last Lines: …ffor it nis no neod wanne hi beoþ þere to sette is here alsoffor to sette is here and eke þere it nere noȝt wel ydo
BLEge2891.Attributed Title: Letania maior de rogacionibus (rubric in margin, f. 70v)

BLHar2277.First Lines: Þe letanie is a song as ȝe mowe ofte iseoTo bidde ech halwe after oþer oure help to beo…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …ffor hit nis no neod whan hi beoþ þere to sette his her alsoTo sette hem here & eke þere hit nere noȝt wel ido

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
LEtanye is a song as ȝe mowe ofte y seTo bidde eche halwe
                    after oþer oure helpe for to be
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…For it nis no nede wanne hy beþ þere to sette it here
                    alsoFor to sette it here & eke þere it nere noȝt wel y
                    do
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
Letania Maior de rogacionibus (f. 72v, by scribe in
                    margin beside first line); Letania Minor, Letania Maior,
                        Letania Minor (f. 72v, down margin )

Lam223.First Lines:
Letanye is a songe þat we may ofte s[‘g’ erased]To
                    pray ich holow after þer oure helpe forto be…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Þat he fordo not þat fruyt þat helpe shal al
                    monkyndeNow Ihesu Crist bringe vs to þat blisse þat þow
                    wonest ynne

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
The letanye is a songe as ȝe mowe oft seTo preye eche seint
                    after oþer our helpe for to be…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…It is no nede whan þei ben þer to sette hem here
                    alsoTo sette hem here & eke þer it were but wel ido
